subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers wanted a burly left-handed slugger like the Phillies’ Matt Stairs, so they imported Jim Thome and his 564 career home runs from the Chicago White Sox.
snippet: The Dodgers wanted a burly left-handed slugger like the Phillies’ Matt Stairs, so they imported Jim Thome and his 564 career home runs from the Chicago White Sox.
